Converters Dictionary Key UIColor UIControlState UIFont UIImage NSTextAlignment UIControlContentHorizontalAlignment UIControlContentVerticalAlignment UIViewContentMode UIEdgeInsets CGRect UIViewTintAdjustmentMode Bool

Bool

Handled by: BooleanConverter

String Bool
"true" true
"yes" true
true true
"false" false
"no" false
false false

Example

"UIButton" : {
	"hidden" : "false",
	"userInteractionEnabled" : true
}
The Bool value can be specified as string or as direct value, the string is case sensitive.
